name: The magic storm (itch)
description:
A hiddenobject game, designed by 7-years-old boy. The original story from my son Timofei for expirienced adventurers.

In this genre it is the second game from Timofei. More difficult than the first game (MysteriousTown). I mean it's very difficult!

Features
  • Original story from 7-years-old boy with open final
  • Hidden object genre
  • 25 items to find at a level that's randomly selected from more than 40 unique items
  • Unique idle animation on every screen
  • 10 scenes to inspect from 15 total
  • Art based on children's drawings
